name: Homie the Clown
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), John Swartzwelder, Richard Appel (staff writer), Jennifer Crittenden (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Homer becomes a Krusty the Clown stand-in, but is mistaken for the real Krusty by the Springfield mafia.
